website_summaries.verdict: This cute, patterned cosmetic bag is ideal for carrying all of your toiletries.
pros: Featuring a durable hook for convenient hanging in your bathroom, this cosmetic bag is perfect for all of your travels
Made of high quality nylon fabric
Very spacious, but folds up easily
cons: It's smaller than other cosmetic bag models

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very excited to use this bag, as it holds a good amount of products and is a cute design. I packed it up, put it in my carry on and flew to my destination. When I unpacked it, the plastic was already coming apart from the zippered compartment and all of the zippers were splitting. Yay, another cheap piece of crap from Amazon! I had a travel toiletry bag from Wally World that I bought almost 15 years ago and it FINALLY gave out. This one took 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: not like in pics.....
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. This might seem petty, but I purchase items based on description-especially pictures. I ordered the blue flower and while cute, it has "DINIWELL" on the huge plastic label on the front and then sporadically all over the bag in the same blue color. Does this affect the function? No. However, what an eyesore. It looks so tacky and NOT what was in the picture. It was only 10.00 so ill keep it, but just so others know.....
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Cosmetic bag!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this makeup bag!! I purchased this one after reading many reviews on amazon. I am so glad I did!! For about 10$ this is not only an amazing deal but it’s super cute and functional! MANY pockets to keep makeup organized so your not having to dig to find everything. Definitely worth the buy?
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer101

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bag! went traveling and it is stiff enough for my items to feel stable and protected and well organized. Good quality and it is cute and stylish. Very happy with my purchase. Was able to fit the following with no problem: full size deodorant, 3 vials of face serum, travel face wash, travel gel, three toothbrushes, two travel toothpastes, mascara, blush brush, eye brush, compact, two make up remover pads in travel packets, eye liner gel pot. Love the hook, I was able to hang it in the bathroom and work from there in the morning, everything organized and in one clean spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm. A lot of pockets. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The color is nice. It's firm and sturdy. I like that it has a lot of small pockets inside so I don't have to dump everything in on place and get crazy to look for the one at the bottom. It also has a little hard plastic sheet at the bottom to hold the bottom flat! I Didn't realize it had an open pocket on the outside in the back too. Good purchase for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: The bottom part it very spacious and seems to be holding the heavier items very well
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my bag, I needed a new one super bad and I found this one for a good price. I love the colors, I was scared it would be too small but everything fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rodah

customer_reviews.title: So useful!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is big enough for all the travel essentials and the waterproof material that is made of is very helpful when traveling and since it goes in so many surfaces it wont get dirty easily . There are a lot of pockets and I love the fact that all the pockets have zippers that way you dont have to worry about items falling every time you open or close it. The price is unbeatable!! Would definitely recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: m.k usa

customer_reviews.title: Not the color as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to stuff with emergency supplies for a friend getting married, and unfortunately The pretty blush pink color as shown on the picture actually looks like a dirty gray in person. I ended up returning it and buying something else in store very disappointing as it does not look like the picture at all
customer_reviews.author: JStraker

customer_reviews.title: Works great & perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a travel hygiene bag! I have been looking for something that I could carry my stuff in so that nothing will spill or get all over anything. It fits compact in my duffel and weekender bags. The closed portion fits all of my bottles perfectly and the fact that it hangs just makes it even more convenient. It feels durable and sturdy, although I haven't actually used it yet. I bought it for an upcoming trip. I will update if I have any issues later on.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and pretty but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag. The bag is super convenient. The way the pouches are made makes it very easy to get my makeup in and out plus the 360 degree swivel means I can hang the bag on anything no matter where I go. Also the bag is very cute and the bag looks even better in person. The only thing I don’t like about the bag is that the zipper came out after a few months, so it became annoying to use the bag as a travel bag. So I just hang it at home..... I will be ordering a second one. I hope the next one doesn’t break again.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage i am currently using this as a make up bag purse and diaper bag lol its working great! Enough room for all my makeup, kids sunscreen, my perfume, a couple of first aid items, a change of clothes for my daughter, my wallet, my glasses wipes, 2 chapsticks, lighters you name it! Only 2 concerns the bag is very dingy it looks like ive had it for a very long time lol and the zippers seem a little hard to zip almost like they are going to break any minute. Good for a diaper bag or travel bag. Not really a cute purse but it works for now
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Deville

customer_reviews.title: Good Price/ Ok Wear
customer_reviews.text: We recently went on a trip and I ordered this bag to keep all of my elderly MIL's cosmetics and shampoo body wash, make up,etc... together so she could access them easy on our trip. The bag is cute and holds everything. It even has a little handle at the top to carry it. The problem is that when she filled it ( and it wasn't overly full) the square piece of velcro that holds a flap down came off right away. This is an easy fix and I can probably fix it easy enough now, but it was kinda a bother on the trip and she resorted to using a Walmart sack instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functions for you
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I swim and go to the gym. It holds everything and neatly. There are comparable bags sold by other companies for twice as much but why pay more? This is a great bag and it hangs well. Tons of things fit in it and when you hang it, those items don't fall out. It's perfect for travel, the pool, the gym or just at home and keeping things in order.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag in April 2018 and the zipper already broke. It lasted about one year. Pros- fits full size shampoo/conditioner and lotion bottles, love the small pockets, inside bag has 2 round holders to hold my face watch and face oil, folds up nice and fits in suitcase. Cons- the zipper broke not even a year later. I am very gentle and careful with all my belongings and this was disappointing. I will buy again because this bag has the best storage and the best size.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping all things in 1 place
customer_reviews.text: I find this toiletry bag very useful to keep anything you need on hand when you are on the go. I used it when I went to the hospital to give birth, and it was easy to have everything in one place. I will also be using it when I go camping. It has many compartments & the material is great. I was only disappointed with the color, it seems brighter on the picture and the actual color is kind of dull.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Garibay

customer_reviews.title: it's very pretty! it's very compact and has a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: it's very pretty! it's very compact and has a lot of pockets. It's true to description. the material is very sturdy and seems water proof. can't wait to use it for my next trip!!
customer_reviews.author: mimibob

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very convenient for my traveling needs. The biggest pocket is roomy enough to fit my bottles of shampoo, conditioner, face wash, and soap with enough room to fit other small items. I use this often for the gym. The hook is convenient since there are no shelves in the bathrooms. There is also a clear pocket that I put cotton swabs and even my phone. The material is made with a waterproof type of fabric so i don't worry about having it in the shower. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rcher

customer_reviews.title: Great so far - very roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it on a trip yet but will soon. So far the bag is as expected, it's very roomy, and can fit most of what I need for travel. I tend to bring a lot of skincare with me on trips that I used to separate into different toiletry bags, this one fits most of what I need which is awesome! The bag itself feels sturdy and the velcro holds the bag shut nicely. Will have to see how it holds up on a trip!
customer_reviews.author: lovliehunnie

customer_reviews.title: Would be great, if properly made!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product but it came with a completely dysfunctional top pocket, there was no zipper to open the pocket. The size would have been perfect for my traveling backpack that I use, and the overall make-up and size of the bag was great. Returning tho since it can't be used fully and my trip is this weekend so I won't need to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Very portable for your products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. I like the quality and size. The only thing I didn't like, that is hard to tell from the photo online, is that the print of the bag is the brand name of the product. I'm not a huge fan of logo products, especially for brands I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my ride or die!!! It fits so many things in their actual bottles and has supported me through heavy travel. I will be purchasing travel sized containers to give it some slack but I absolutely love this toiletry bag. The various pockets allow me to be as organized as possible. I hardly ever use the hook but it’s a great addition to have. This bag is great and discreet in case you don’t want a clear plastic toiletry bag. This bag is a lifesaver. All my essentials fit without over loading the bag! Quick grab and go, making packing ever so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for at home & travel
customer_reviews.text: I get TONS of compliments on this make up bag. I had planned on just using it for travel but I ended up using it to store all my make up at home as well. (and i have a lot of make up.) It travels extremely well. I didn’t check out the measurements in advance like I should’ve but I was super pleased with the size when it arrived! Functional pockets and zippers and velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Crump

customer_reviews.title: Best for traveling purposes
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product .I bought this for my sister as a small gift as she was packing for her honeymoon next month.It helped her a lotto keep her things organized n tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This app toiletry Bag is worth every penny. The compartments are big enough to hold actual products. The Velcro is strong enough to hold the bag closed, even when it’s full. There are enough compartments to separate my makeup brushes from other items so they aren’t damaged nor do they get dirty. The inside lining is perfect in case you have a spill because everything wipes off easily. I chose this bag last minute for daily use and I’m so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy. I don't regret it one bit. Bought this for an 8 day cruise I went on earlier this year. It is made with great quality, fits a LOT of stuff. And is sturdy when you hang it. It is waterproof too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sis... get this makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so perfect and it’s cheap! But doesn’t feel cheap. So sturdy I stuffed allll my makeup and brushes in here to the top and carry it by just holding on to the hook while open, it’s heavy but doesn’t tear. Awesome makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lannie Jolaine

customer_reviews.title: more plastic than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought them as bridal party gifts. I'm particularly impressed with the hook that allows them to hang if desired. They're cute, simple, and a good size. They're just more plastic-like than they appear in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Westrich

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great size! It holds my stuff plus my family's! I also like how everything can stand up in it so it stays neat and organized. Finally, I like how many pockets it has for things such as cotton balls, hair ties, jewelry, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Convenient Organization.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Does what it's intended to do. Lightweight, good organizer pockets, convenient handle and hanger. Haven't had it long enough, or used it enough, to really judge it's durability but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have ordered. I used the 1st as a snack bag for baseball/softball games. Super sturdy, wipes off easily, well made and extra cute! I decided I needed another for all the other things that get thrown in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: April Cowdin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little toiletries case for carry-on online passenger!
customer_reviews.text: This case isn't as big as some, but that is exactly what I was looking for as I only like to fly with a carry-on, therefore, space is precious. It holds all my necessities and the hanging function is super nice for hostels where you don't have much room for your things.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyamcnab

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I’m 8 months pregnant and needed something for toiletries for my hospital bag. This is perfect. Just enough pockets and lightweight. Can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This bag was not spacious enough for my purposes in traveling.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time and it came apart at the seams! It was NOT over packed. I was on a 2 day, 1 night business trip so I didn't bring many toiletries with me. You'd be better off using a ziplock bag! Such a shame because it is a really cute bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: The quality was terrible. Zipper would not work. This is paper thin cheap nylon material. The hanger in it was that hard plastic cheap hook. I was totally shocked at awful it was. In fact I bought 2 different styles both cheap bags. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: angie2499

customer_reviews.title: The plastic hook will fail you.
customer_reviews.text: The hook is designed to fail. I love that it stands on it’s own, there are many compartments but the plastic hook is not design to hold anything heavy, that’s including your normal travel items. Be prepared to retrofit with a metal hook.
customer_reviews.author: Vay

customer_reviews.title: Love it :-)
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I bring it everywhere with me now whenever I travel. Super compact! Also I accidentally spilled something on it, and washed it, and it’s totally okay!!! Edit: it’s now fallen apart after almost a year of use and tons of traveling. Got my usage in!! Probably best to go for a more sturdier travel case if traveling with a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Madisen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made bag! I use it for travel. I was able to fit all of my makeup products that I had in a larger toiletry bag into this one and thus save room in my suitcase. One critic: I wasn’t able to fit my makeup brushes into the front pocket so I had to put them into the main compartment. The front pocket could be deeper to fit brushes better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for space-saving!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. I live in a small dorm room and I needed to free up space on my desk so I bought this in order to move all my makeup into a drawer. It's even better, though, because it unfolds into a little caddy with a hook at the top that you can hang on your wall to take advantage of that wall space. The overall quality is very nice and would hold up to a few trips, but it isn't super heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Lolobagogo

customer_reviews.title: How’d I travel without this?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for travel toiletries. Bottles provided for liquids hold enough for at least a week of shampoo/conditioner/lotion/body wash. Even with the bottles packed, there’s easily enough room for a full sized toothbrush in a travel holder, travel toothpaste, reg sized deodorant, hairbrush. Lots of little pockets for cotton swabs, and other little things you’d like to be separated. Hanging hook sturdy enough to support the full bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G

customer_reviews.title: Great for craft bag
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good for traveling and sturdiness feel of it. Durability is yet to be determined by time..I use this for crafts rather than traveling bag but has kept what I needed in its place without being scattered everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: jengee2

customer_reviews.title: A lot of space in a small bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag to travel with my toiletries. Everything I need fits here, and there is space for even more. Also, it has good compartments to bring your makeup, personal items, etc. Without it being everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel or at home
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of pockets and zippers and sleeves to fit all of your toiletries. It can also fit a lot of stuff. Great for putting in your suitcase or you could even use it at home. I think it would be really good for a college student or someone with limited counter space too because you can keep items pretty organized inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamplemousse

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my cruise. Works great. I love all the different sections, especially with zippered pockets so items don’t fall out. I use it for my everyday makeup bag now. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jcan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is exactly as pictured and arrived on time! The base of the bag is definitely spacious for varies toiletry items, I can fit my tooth brush/tooth paste (full sizes), my facial moisturizer, my deodorant, and my bar soap container and still have tons of space! The top zipper pockets is nice for hair tie and Bobby pin storage! Highly recommend for a frequent traveler or one who likes an organized travel case for the rare travel occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Pom

customer_reviews.title: Gift That Was Happily Recieved
customer_reviews.text: This travel organizer was given to a friend who said that she was amazed at all the storage space in this little organizer. It can be folded flat when not in use. Holds about a dozen or more travel sized items. Well made and cute.
customer_reviews.author: TexasRose

customer_reviews.title: Makes your trip easier!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a toiletry bag. I had a trip that I had to stay one night at hotel and move to another for 5 days. This bag help me a lot to pack and go. I didn't need to pull out my stuffs out because I was able to see all at once and take things out easily. One minor thing is.. How do I wash this? I got some stain on and I've been soaking and rubbing with soap but it doesnt go away... Functionally its perfect! taking care is ..not sure..
customer_reviews.author: S. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, but definitely is a “get what you paid for” thing. I really like the bag itself and it works great for my needs. The zipper sometimes comes apart, but it’s easy to fix the zip. The pockets within the main part are also coming loose a bit, but I don’t use/need those much. All in all, it’s a great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Fits allllllllot of stuff in it for what looks like such a small bag. I’ve fit small bottles of shampoo and conditioner, travel size face wash, my toothbrush, small size detangler, full size hair oil, my whole pack of face wipes, and a small hair brush in there at once before. Highly recommend because the material is pretty durable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Quality made bag and everything fit
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag on our last 2-3 day trip and it worked great! It held all the items I needed for this short trip. It fit in my suitcase and kept my items organized. I would definitely buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Abrao

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, quality.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my SIL for her birthday. I live in the US and she is in Europe. The shipping fee for international shipping is much more reasonable than I thought it would be. She loved it and has been using it. It holds up well and continuous to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. I did think it was going to be a lot bigger than what it is but it fits everything I needed. I use it all the time and for traveling. You definitely can’t fit full size products in it you would have to get travel sizes. I would definitely buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Roby

customer_reviews.title: I love the hook it has where you can hang it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious. Fits everything I need to travel with and more. I love the hook it has where you can hang it up and still access all of the pockets. I went through TSA with this in my carry on with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee J

customer_reviews.title: Cute hanging travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it’s not only good for travel, but also good for taking to the gym. I love the fresh design and the inside fits a lot of product, including combs, brushes, and other toiletries. I highly recommend this product to anybody that is looking for a travel toiletry bag that hangs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice sturdy and roomy bag for travel and at home to have everything you need at hand love the print and would highly recommend to family and friends. great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy gib

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag for showering in the community showers where I am. I don’t use the hanging feature so I can’t comment on that but everything else has held up for the past month I’ve been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Arrasmith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag. I use mine as a makeup bag. After two years of frequent use (traveling, but also using on a daily basis just hanging in my closet to hold makeup), some areas started to wear and had some small tears. But I love the organzation so much, so I purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Summer188

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper before first use
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and functional pockets, but the zipper broke and seam tore before my first use. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Akers

customer_reviews.title: A very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my travel. It holds so much of my toiletries in an organized manner. And I get compliments for how cute it is too.
customer_reviews.author: bluebell

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and design for price paid. Fitted everything needed for our vacation both for hubby and me. Nice to be able to keep all in the bag and hang it in bathroom for easy store and retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Wanetadrift

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, love this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this bag. It’s got so much storage but doesn’t take up too much room. If you travel you need this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: The many pockets makes this easy to travel with. Holds all of our toiletry items (2 adults, one child), and nothing gets lost as they would in a large bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R. Spolidoro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: This held the following FULL-SIZED products for a mini vacation I went on : shampoo, conditioner, hair mousse, body oil, coconut oil, deodorant, and two B&BW sprays ! Along with my toothbrush and paste and my face bars. There are little mesh pockets that can hold floss picks and hair pins, a front zippered pocket that can hold p/liners etc . . WOMEN ! This is the perfect weekender toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kam.bana

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting
customer_reviews.text: I commute 3 days a week and this really helps to keep me organized. It's great for being able to hang it up and grab what I need. Also, does not take up a lot of space in my bag. I like that there's lots of pockets to keep certain items all in one spot. I also like that I'm able to hang it up on a shower rod for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan W

customer_reviews.title: Nice make up bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made make up bag. This is perfect for traveling and for your own home use. Nice organization inside for separating your make-up. Happy customer. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Pattern is ugly and they have the company name Written all over in the pattern , size is small as well
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag is waterproof and strong. The only drawback for me is that I needed a little more space to adequately put in all that I need to take to the bathroom in campus where I am studying.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Small but works
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than anticipated! But, it does look adorable and serves its purpose for traveling and for makeup
customer_reviews.author: Selena Collazo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this!!!!!’
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what Ive been hoping for. It holds all my makeup and it’s easy to carry around. I will order a few for my daughters and anyone else that I think could use it.
customer_reviews.author: MelBel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t even last a week before one of the zippers broke off! They didn’t put the “end piece” on the zipper and if you didn’t DELICATELY unzip the pocket, it would come right off! And the bag is SO SMALL!! It doesn’t hold all my makeup in it. And I don’t own a lot of makeup! Only reason I gave it two stars is because the pattern is cute and it didn’t totally fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great toiletries bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bag for toiletries! For more than I thought it would and keeps it all compact and organized. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marvelis Swinney

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for all of my makeup and then some. I have not traveled with it yet It seems durable. Price was great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality, Super Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this travel bag! It helps keep everything organized inside, it's super nice quality and the outside is waterproof. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: omama warsi

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Perfect quality and price! Good toiletry bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional thing. I like the color. The quality is excellent. I bought the same bag, but a different brand and sticking threads in it. In this bag, the threads do not stick out. Bag stitched perfectly. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for traveling with toiletries. It fits a lot of products and is sturdy. I love the pattern too!
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great little compact make up bag
customer_reviews.text: Just a little too tight for my brushes. Other than that it’s great. Good for travel 🧳
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had more bigger pockets. But it's a good travel makeup bag. I can fit all my essentials in here and it has a cute pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Made with very cheap material. The first time I put anything in the zipper compartment the zipper came off the track and the product couldn't be used. It gets 2 stars since it has a cute design and looks the same as its advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick weekend trips. Plenty of pockets to keep your things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Metz

customer_reviews.title: Held my needful things
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this when was living with 3 toddlers that distroy everything. This bag held all my needful bathroom things and easily hung on my walker bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the low price I was expecting some cheap junk. But the quality is very good. I pulled on the compartments and the plastic and ut is extremely durable. Just dont overpack it and it will stay nice. GREAT quality fir the price!
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Yesss this is nice, i fiited all my personal product in here it have many compartments
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Cute and will work for me
customer_reviews.text: So this bag is really cute. I see everyone else pretty much picks the same color. So far my impression is it will hold up. Using it for a 10 day trip over sees and as long as tge zippers work it will be fine. I dlnt plan on hanging it. Overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashante' Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for all my prescription drugs works great for my medicine bag.
customer_reviews.author: AuntGigi

customer_reviews.title: not the best material
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that this bag was all plastic, Though it hasn't been used long enough, my knowledge on this type of material tells me that it will not last long, get cracks and tears.
customer_reviews.author: Grady R Catherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great deal! I took it to Hawaii. It worked great!! It fit all of my stuff in it and was easy to store in bathroom and luggage. It was better then what I thought I was getting. The design also looked like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: VIDA

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful bag to organize things in one place
customer_reviews.text: HaloVa cosmetic bag came as promised. It is a wonderful bag to organize things in one place. It was packaged well and I will use this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: ginnie mae

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with lots of pockets. Smaller than I thought it would be, but it's a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Young

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected! Still great quality though, but it doesn't fit a massive amount especially if you want it to close.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. Compact enough to fit in my carry on, but still fits the essentials. Love the little hook so that I can hang it up while getting ready. Not the thickest fabric, but it'll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Azcwgrl

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: The size and design of this product are good and I like how it keeps its box like shape when hung up. However, I only used it on two trips before the clear vinyl part began to fall apart and let items fall out the bottom. I had to duct tape it and have to replace the duct tape frequently. Look for something better and do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke before I even used it. Cheap product. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: This thing fits a lot of stuff with a few pockets to hold flat items
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Two days into a cruise the Velcro started falling off. Grrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynbabe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size for college or overnight trips.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter took this to college for easy portability when coming home some weekends. She hangs it from a 5# command hook on the wall to keep her toiletries organized. She said she likes the fabric and quality of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to hold and organize my makeup. Works great and hangs in my bathroom. Keeps my counter and drawers clutter free.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect traveling bag. It is made well and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura howard

customer_reviews.title: ... it for vacation and said it was roomy and perfect for what she needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and used it for vacation and said it was roomy and perfect for what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Durable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Holds a lot! I used for my hospital bag for birth. Held everything I needed and then some. Hangs right on the door. Will continue to use for all vacations. Durable!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I fit travel size and not travel size items in here perfectly great to have for any trip.
customer_reviews.author: Cynra

❤ Large Capacity - Convenient to carry your toiletries, Cosmetic, Shaving, Travel Accessories and your personal items. The durable hook is convenient for hanging the toiletry bag wherever in the hotel or in the tent for space saving.
❤ Always use the Material of the best Quality - High quality nylon fabric, Use of portable, waterproof wear resistance, high elasticity.

❤ After-sales Service - Quality problems occur within one year replacement, lifetime warranty, if you're not completely satisfied, then CONTACT US and we will give you a 100% refund within 90 days of purchase. It is our intention to offer the BEST customer service on Amazon.
